## Description {#details}

Magic data for optimising signed division by a constant.

Definition at line 21 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/divisionbyconstantinfo-h">DivisionByConstantInfo.h</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### get() {#affa10b6ac03585fea6d8f1832071ebd5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SignedDivisionByConstantInfo SignedDivisionByConstantInfo::get (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; D)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Calculate the magic numbers required to implement a signed integer division by a constant as a sequence of multiplies, adds and shifts.

Requires that the divisor not be 0, 1, or -1. Taken from &quot;Hacker&#39;s Delight&quot;, Henry S. Warren, Jr., Chapter 10.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/divisionbyconstantinfo-h/#l00022">22</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/divisionbyconstantinfo-h">DivisionByConstantInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/divisionbyconstantinfo-cpp/#l00021">21</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/divisionbyconstantinfo-cpp">DivisionByConstantInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
